lead_paragraph: José Luis Arrieta of Spain won the 19th stage of the Spanish Vuelta yesterday, and Alexander Vinokourov of Kazakhstan retained the overall lead. Arrieta completed the 128-mile route from Jaén to Ciudad Real in 5 hours 30 minutes 14 seconds. Dmitriy Fofonov of Kazakhstan was second in the same time while David Loosli of Switzerland was two seconds behind in third place. Today’s penultimate stage is a 17.09-mile time trial from Rivas Futura to Rivas Vaciamadrid.
